Vps_M2mVpeOverridePrevFldBuf Struct Reference
VPS Driver API » M2M API » M2M VPE API

Structure used to override the previous field context buffers. More...

#include <vps_m2mVpe.h>

Data Fields

Fvid2_FrameList * fldBufFrameList [VPS_DEI_MAX_CTX_FLD_BUF]
 
UInt32 numFldBufLists
 

Detailed Description

Structure used to override the previous field context buffers.

struct Vps_M2mVpeOverridePrevFldBuf

Field Documentation

Fvid2_FrameList* Vps_M2mVpeOverridePrevFldBuf::fldBufFrameList[VPS_DEI_MAX_CTX_FLD_BUF]

[IN] FVID2 frame list containing the previous field buffers for the requried channels.

chNum in Fvid2_Frame will be used to update the corresponding channel field buffers in driver objects.

numFrames in all the Fvid2_FrameList should be same and less than numCh created during Fvid2_create.

N-1 field buffer is at index 0, N-2 at index 1 and so on.

UInt32 Vps_M2mVpeOverridePrevFldBuf::numFldBufLists

[IN] Number of previous field buffer frame lists. In case of TI814x/TI807 this should be set to 2 as the DEI IP in these platforms takes in only N-1 and N-2 inputs.
